name: President Forever 2016 for Mac
blurb: In-depth Presidential election sim for political wonks - time to bring it to Mac!

rewards.reward: Political well-wisher - pledge $5 just because you love Macs and love politics, and want to see the game made for Mac! You will receive our eternal thanks, good karma, and a shout out to you and a site of your choosing on the 270soft blog.
Get Congress Forever 2014 (Windows or Mac) when it is released in 2014!
Political geek, Windows version - pledge $15 to get digital downloadable copy of game for Windows. These will be fulfilled once the Kickstarter campaign reaches its goal.
Political geek - pledge $15 to get digital downloadable copy of game for Mac OS X. (This is significantly less than the cost of the game once it is released.)

Political wonk, Windows version - pledge $20 to get President Forever 2016 for Windows (these will be fulfilled once the Kickstarter campaign reaches its goal) + be immortalized in political fame by having your name in credits in a special 'Wonk' thanks section of the game.
Political wonk - pledge $20 to get the previous reward + be immortalized in political fame by having your name in credits in a special 'Wonk' thanks section of the game.
Political geek + Congress Forever 2014 - All the rewards of the Political geek tier (Windows or Mac) plus get Congress Forever 2014 (Windows or Mac) when it is released in 2014.

Political backer - pledge $25 and be immortalized in political fame by having your name in credits in a special 'Bundler' thanks section of the game + have a VOTE ON THE P4E16 STEERING COUNCIL, where you decide which feature will be added to P4E16 next each month up until the 2016 election. Note: there will be at most 150 Steering Council spots.
Political wonk + Congress Forever 2014 - All the rewards of the Political wonk tier plus get Congress Forever 2014 (Windows or Mac) when it is released in 2014.

Political surrogate - pledge $30 and get 2 LICENSES of President Forever 2016 for Mac (or Windows) for yourself and to give to your political friends, allies, and enemies + be immortalized in political fame by having your name in credits in a special 'Surrogate' thanks section of the game + WE WILL ADD YOU AS A SURROGATE FOR CANDIDATE OF YOUR CHOICE IN THE GAME unlocked when type in special code.
Political surrogate + Congress Forever 2014 - All the rewards of the Political surrogate tier plus get Congress Forever 2014 (Windows or Mac) when it is released in 2014.

Political bundler - pledge $40 to get 3 LICENSES of President Forever 2016 for Mac (or Windows) for yourself and to give to your political friends, allies, and enemies + be immortalized in political fame by having your name in credits in a special 'Bundler' thanks section of the game + WE WILL ADD YOU AS FUNDRAISING ENDORSER IN GAME unlocked when type in special code.
Political bundler + Congress Forever 2014 - All the rewards of the Political bundler tier plus get Congress Forever 2014 (Windows or Mac) when it is released in 2014.

Political guru - pledge $50 to get President Forever 2016 for Mac (or Windows) + be immortalized in political fame by having your name AND GURU QUOTATION in credits in a special 'Guru' thanks section of the game + have a VOTE ON THE P4E16 STEERING COUNCIL, where you decide which feature will be added to P4E16 next each month up until the 2016 election

Political surrogate + steering council - pledge $60 and get President Forever 2016 for Mac (or Windows) + be immortalized in political fame by having your name in credits in a special 'Surrogate' thanks section of the game + have a VOTE ON THE P4E16 STEERING COUNCIL, where you decide which feature will be added to P4E16 next each month up until the 2016 election + WE WILL ADD YOU AS A SURROGATE FOR CANDIDATE OF YOUR CHOICE IN THE GAME unlocked when type in special code.

Political mastermind (max. 10) - pledge $150 and get 9 LICENSES of President Forever 2016 for Mac (or Windows) to give to your political friends, allies, and enemies + be immortalized in political fame by having your name in credits in a special 'Mastermind' thanks section of the game + have a VOTE ON THE P4E16 STEERING COUNCIL, where you decide which feature will be added to P4E16 next each month up until the 2016 election + WE WILL INCLUDE YOU AS A CANDIDATE IN THE OFFICIAL 2016 CAMPAIGN (for one of the existing parties of your choice).

Political god (max. 5) - $500. You understand it so well you almost transcend human politics. 9 LICENSES + name in credits + NAME AND SCROLLING QUOTE ON START SCREEN + have a VOTE ON THE P4E16 STEERING COUNCIL, where you decide which feature will be added to P4E16 next each month up until the 2016 election + WE WILL INCLUDE YOU AS A CANDIDATE IN THE OFFICIAL 2016 CAMPAIGN (for one of the existing parties of your choice) + WE WILL CREATE AN OFFICIAL CAMPAIGN OF YOUR CHOICE FOR P4E16 (any real life election of your choice).
